sections.heading: of "An act concerning state aid for schools, making an appropriation therefor, and repealing P
sections.text: L.1946, c. 63, P.L.1948, c. 66, P.L.1951, c. 227, sections 18:10-49, 18:12-4 through 18:12-9, and 18:15-6 through 18:15-16 of the Revised Statutes and amendments and supplements thereto," approved June 30,
